headline: First Solar (FSLR): Valuation Spotlight After Major Tax Credit Deals Unlock New Liquidity
summary: First Solar (FSLR) just signed two major Tax Credit transfer agreements with a leading digital payments company, unlocking access to hundreds of millions of dollars in advanced manufacturing tax credits. This move delivers fresh liquidity and highlights First Solar's focus on strengthening its footing in the renewable energy space. See our latest analysis for First Solar. First Solar’s recent Tax Credit deals arrive as momentum in its stock price has accelerated throughout 2024. The past...
